name: Elemental RTS
description:
Elemental RTS is a basic real-time strategy game. It should teach the core elements of this genre.

- Manage die balance between economy and battle units

- Use hotkeys and control groups

- Scout the Opponent and adapt your strategy

- Put your ressources on the field

There are two categories with each three steps to adjust your opponents level of difficulty.

Choose your opponents speed (like APM): slow, moderate, fast

Choose your opponents strategy capacity: easy, medium, hard

The differences between the levels of the AI strategy effects the strength of the AI much more than the speed.

Therefore following order of difficulty is recommended:

1 - SLOW, EASY

2 - MODERATE, EASY

3 - FAST, EASY

4 - SLOW, MEDIUM

5 - MODERATE, MEDIUM

6 - FAST, MEDIUM

7 - SLOW, HARD

8 - MODERATE, HARD

9 - FAST, HARD

Here are the Hotkeys for this game:

1 - free usable control group

2 - free usable control group

3 - select red building

4 - select green building

5 - select blue building

6 - select grey building

A - build unit

S - upgrade unit

V - split group of units to attack from flanks

Y/Z - unsplit

W - Attack Move (go to destination point but attack everything on the way)
